docs.lead_paragraph: Chris Kennedy, son of the late Sen. Robert F. Kennedy, announced Wednesday he will run for Illinois governor in 2018, bringing the instant name recognition of his family's political legacy to what's expected to be a sharply contested race to unseat Republican Gov. Bruce Rauner.

headline.main: Robert F. Kennedy's Son Announces Bid for Illinois Governor
